1 import cv2
2 
3 import rospy
4 from sensor_msgs.msg import CompressedImage
5 
6 publishers = {}
7 
8 
9 def pub_debug_img(img, topic='~debug'):
10  """
11  Publish an image to the specified debug topic.
12 
13  :param img: The image to be published.
14  """
15  global publishers
16  if topic not in publishers:
17  publishers[topic] = rospy.Publisher(topic, CompressedImage, queue_size=1, latch=True)
18 
19  _, encoded_img = cv2.imencode('.jpg', img, [int(cv2.IMWRITE_JPEG_QUALITY), 80])
20  msg = CompressedImage()
21  msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
22  msg.format = 'jpg'
23  msg.data = encoded_img.tobytes()
24  publishers[topic].publish(msg)
